title: My take on some -hazard symbols
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]


[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="⚠️ Infohazard" hide="hide"]]
[[=image infohazardsign size="small"]]
> Hazard triangle adapted from [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Warning.svg Wikimedia Commons], released by Open Clip Art Library under CC0 1.0. Art within is my own.
Just a simple play on i for information and an exclamation mark!

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="⚠️ Cognitohazard" hide="hide"]]
[[=image cognitohazardsign size="small"]]
> Hazard triangle adapted from [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Warning.svg Wikimedia Commons], released by Open Clip Art Library under CC0 1.0.

> Eye adapted from [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Eye_-_The_Noun_Project.svg Wikimedia Commons], released by the Noun Project under CC0 1.0.
Eye as a shorthand for perception, and then the classic exclamation mark.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="⚠️ Semiohazard" hide="hide"]]
[[=image semiohazardsign size="small"]]
> Hazard triangle adapted from [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Warning.svg Wikimedia Commons], released by Open Clip Art Library under CC0 1.0. Art within is my own.

From the classic explanation of semiohazards "one plus one doesn't always equal two" (SCP-INTEGER by Placeholder McD).

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="⚠️ Bureaucratohazard" hide="hide"]]
[[=image bureaucratohazardsign size="small"]]
> Hazard triangle adapted from [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Warning.svg Wikimedia Commons], released by Open Clip Art Library under CC0 1.0. Art within is my own.

Scales used to mean laws, as paper/sheets just looked like a symbol for a written cognitohazard. Tipped scales for wrongness.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible hideLocation="both" show="⚠️ Narrativohazard" hide="hide"]]

> Hazard triangle adapted from [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Warning.svg Wikimedia Commons], released by Open Clip Art Library under CC0 1.0. Art within is my own.
[[=image narrativohazardsign size="small"]]
The [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hero%27s_journey diagram of the heroes journey] simplified and disrupted by an external force, which has also entered the 'Known' aka disrupting normalcy.

[[/collapsible]]
author: FiendsReach
